verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: After a roundtable discussion of MS-13 with the Department of Homeland Security in Bethpage , New York] , [ARG0: Trump] [V: headed] [ARG1: to the Marine One] [ARGM-TMP: after a long day ’s work] . That ’s when he spotted a group of law enforcement officers off to the side .

After a roundtable discussion of MS-13 with the Department of Homeland Security in Bethpage , New York , Trump headed to the Marine One after a long day ’s work . [ARG1: That] [V: ’s] [ARG2: when he spotted a group of law enforcement officers off to the side] .

After a roundtable discussion of MS-13 with the Department of Homeland Security in Bethpage , New York , Trump headed to the Marine One after a long day ’s work . That ’s [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: he] [V: spotted] [ARG1: a group of law enforcement officers off to the side] .
